data.enText: a long roll of paper for writing on
a decoration cut in stone or wood with a curved shape like a roll of paper
to move text on a computer screen up or down so that you can read different parts of it

data.chText: 用箭头键把文件目录滚动一遍。
data.enText: Use the arrow keys to scroll through the list of files.
Scroll down to the bottom of the document.

data.chText: 用箭头键滚动文件目录。
data.enText: Use the arrow keys to scroll the list of files.

tr: a document that can be rolled up (as for storage)
a round shape formed by a series of concentric circles (as formed by leaves or flower petals)
move through text or graphics in order to display parts that do not fit on the screen
example: Scroll down to see the entire text

value.def: A scroll is a long roll of paper or a similar material with writing on it.

example.ex: Ancient scrolls were found in caves by the Dead Sea.
example.tran: 死海旁边的山洞里发现了古代的卷轴。

value.def: A scroll is a painted or carved decoration made to look like a scroll.

example.ex: ...a handsome suite of chairs incised with Grecian scrolls.
example.tran: 一套雕刻着古希腊式涡卷形装饰的造型美观的椅子

value.def: If you scroll through text on a computer screen, you move the text up or down to find the information that you need.

example.ex: I scrolled down to find 'United States of America'.
example.tran: 我向下滚动文档搜索“美利坚合众国”。
